segments.text: I see the girl standing there, waiting for a cookie from her brother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, but she doesn’t realize how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on that stool like it’s nothing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she trusts him completely, even though he’s about to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading across the floor, and no one is paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ll get caught before they even get their cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for the girl—she’s just going to be disappointed if this goes wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is tilting more and more, and I can’t watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they realize what they’re doing before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
